duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform technical pre-sales activities including demonstrations and consultations with key prospects.
Build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders.
Translate between technical and non-technical audiences, internally and externally.
Identify and document customer requirements, challenges, and opportunities, and propose the most suitable solutions.
Collaborate with the sales team to close business and assist in responding to RFPs.
Research, identify, and qualify sales prospects, and work closely with external channel partners.

education_certification.credential: Practical background or qualification in IT/SaaS domain. Proficiency in English and Spanish languages.
